properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 3 at 4:56AM AKST until January 5 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 45 below occuring. The cold wind
chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to
exposed skin. North winds gusting to 45 mph.

* WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast.

* WHEN....

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and coldest wind chills
from Kivalina north.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED
